message.entry: {0,number,integer}-D data is not supported for GIF files. Image data must be either 2-D (single-frame) or 4-D (multi-frame, with third dimension of 1), and either grayscale or indexed.
{0,number,integer}-D colormap not supported for GIF files. Colormap must be 2-D or 3-D.
Colormap may be 3-D only if 4-D image data is provided.
GIF supports colormaps with a maximum of 256 colors. Colormap will be truncated.
Parameter name must be a character vector or string scalar.
''Comment'' value must be a column vector cell array of character vectors, a character vector, or a string array.
The ''{0}'' parameter has no effect in append mode.
Image data contains values that are out of range. Out of range values will be given the nearest valid value.
''TransparentColor'' property out of range and will have no effect.
''BackgroundColor'' property out of range and will have no effect.
4-D data must contain only grayscale or indexed images. The third dimension must be 1.
